question: A train of length 500 feet crosses a platform of length 700 feet in 10 seconds. The speed of the train is :
explanation:
$latex Speed\\ of\\ train\\ = \\frac{Length\\ of\\ (train+platform)}{Time\\ taken\\ to\\ cross}&s=1$
$latex = \\left ( \\frac{500+700}{10} \\right ) = 120\\ feet/ sec.&s=1$
Hence option [D] is correct answer.
